sections.heading: Scope of warranty of debtor's solvencyAn assignor who warrants the solvency of the debtor warrants that solvency at the time of the assignment only and, in the absence of agreement to the contrary, does not warrant the future solvency of the debtor
sections.text: Acts 1993, No. 841, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1995.
